column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A Pakistani man was injured at 9:10 pm on 1 June 2020
column4: along the riverside park next to Sisowath Quay in Sangkat Phsar Kandal I
column6: the Pakistani victim was robbed of a mobile phone
column7: but did not a complaint. On the night of the incident
column8: the victim saw the suspect sitting in the riverbank. The foreigner attempted to restrain the suspect
column9: who fought back with a blow to the head. Immediately
column10: citizens at the scene on the scene tried to stop the violence
column11: and the suspect tried to escape until authorities intervened.------Local authorities have sent the victim to the hospital for treatment of the injury
column12: and will file a criminal complaint against the suspect. ------AREY
